data.prayer: Spirit, awaken a burning desire for your presence and intimacy among the 1,200 people living in the state of Shirak.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Shirak, Armenia
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, defend those who are loyal to your Word in the state of Shirak, even against fierce enemies.
data.verse: Though the wicked bind me with ropes, I will not forget your law.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 10 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 110 believers in Shirak and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.prayer: Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the state of Shirak, Armenia who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Marmashen
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Marmashen, Shirak, Armenia.
Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Shirak words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Lord, let it be said of the 1,089 lost in Shirak that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Shirak, Armenia not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.
